articles.author: Elliot Smith
articles.title: European markets retreat to end wild week of volatility - CNBC
articles.description: European markets fell sharply on Friday as global stocks continue to be mired in extreme volatility after the Fed's monetary policy meeting.
articles.content:
LONDON European markets pulled back on Friday as global stocks closed out a week of extreme volatility following the U.S. Federal Reserve's monetary policy meeting.
The pan-European Stoxx 600 fell 1… [+2438 chars]

articles.title: Factbox: What are Europe's options in case of Russian gas disruption? - Reuters
articles.description: Tensions between Russia and Ukraine have heightened concerns about Russian gas flows, prompting the United States to assure European allies it will help them find alternative supplies.
